metadata.title: CVE-2024-1441 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An off-by-one error flaw was found in the udevListInterfacesByStatus()function in libvirt when the number of interfaces exceeds the size of the`names` array. This issue can be reproduced by sending specially crafteddata to the libvirt daemon, allowing an unprivileged client to perform adenial of service attack by causing the libvirt daemon to crash.

criterions.comment: libvirt package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
